AxMacroDictionary.Name: MCRMSCOMMCOMDEF
AxMacroDictionary.Source:
// Definitions for use with the MSCOMM COM object.
#define.MSCOMM_COM('{648A5600-2C6E-101B-82B6-000000000014}')
#define.HandshakingConstants_NoHandshaking(0) #define.HandshakingConstants_XonXoff(1) #define.HandshakingConstants_RtsCts(2) #define.HandshakingConstants_XonXoffAndRtsCts(3)
#define.HandshakeConstants_comNone(0) #define.HandshakeConstants_comXOnXoff(1) #define.HandshakeConstants_comRTS(2) #define.HandshakeConstants_comRTSXOnXOff(3)
#define.ErrorConstants_comInvalidPropertyValue(380) #define.ErrorConstants_comGetNotSupported(394) #define.ErrorConstants_comSetNotSupported(383) #define.ErrorConstants_comPortInvalid(8002) #define.ErrorConstants_comPortAlreadyOpen(8005) #define.ErrorConstants_comPortOpen(8000) #define.ErrorConstants_comNoOpen(8012) #define.ErrorConstants_comSetCommStateFailed(8015) #define.ErrorConstants_comPortNotOpen(8018) #define.ErrorConstants_comReadError(8020) #define.ErrorConstants_comDCBError(8021) #define.ErrorConstants_comBreak(1001) #define.ErrorConstants_comCTSTO(1002) #define.ErrorConstants_comDSRTO(1003) #define.ErrorConstants_comFrame(1004) #define.ErrorConstants_comOverrun(1006) #define.ErrorConstants_comCDTO(1007) #define.ErrorConstants_comRxOver(1008) #define.ErrorConstants_comRxParity(1009) #define.ErrorConstants_comTxFull(1010) #define.ErrorConstants_comDCB(1011)
#define.CommEventConstants_comEventBreak(1001) #define.CommEventConstants_comEventCTSTO(1002) #define.CommEventConstants_comEventDSRTO(1003) #define.CommEventConstants_comEventFrame(1004) #define.CommEventConstants_comEventOverrun(1006) #define.CommEventConstants_comEventCDTO(1007) #define.CommEventConstants_comEventRxOver(1008) #define.CommEventConstants_comEventRxParity(1009) #define.CommEventConstants_comEventTxFull(1010) #define.CommEventConstants_comEventDCB(1011)
#define.OnCommConstants_comEvSend(1) #define.OnCommConstants_comEvReceive(2) #define.OnCommConstants_comEvCTS(3) #define.OnCommConstants_comEvDSR(4) #define.OnCommConstants_comEvCD(5) #define.OnCommConstants_comEvRing(6) #define.OnCommConstants_comEvEOF(7)
#define.InputModeConstants_comInputModeText(0) #define.InputModeConstants_comInputModeBinary(1)
